description: This file defines the NotificationService class, which provides methods to interact with notifications via API calls, including fetching, updating, deleting notifications, managing notification settings, subscribing to real-time updates via WebSocket, and executing notification-related actions.

classes.name: NotificationService
classes.description: A service class encapsulating notification-related API interactions and real-time WebSocket updates.

methods.name: getNotifications
methods.description: Fetch paginated notifications with optional filters.

methods.name: getNotification
methods.description: Retrieve a specific notification by ID.

methods.name: markAsRead
methods.description: Mark a specific notification as read.

methods.name: markAsUnread
methods.description: Mark a specific notification as unread.

methods.name: markAllAsRead
methods.description: Mark all notifications as read for the current user.

methods.name: deleteAllRead
methods.description: Delete all read notifications for the current user.

methods.name: getUnreadCount
methods.description: Retrieve the count of unread notifications.

methods.name: getNotificationSettings
methods.description: Fetch notification preferences for the current user.

methods.name: subscribeToUpdates
methods.description: Subscribe to real-time notification updates via WebSocket.

methods.name: executeNotificationAction
methods.description: Execute an action associated with a notification.
